tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_mergers(
    merger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    merger_date DATE,
    media_company VARCHAR(255),
    acquiring_company VARCHAR(255),
    market_impact DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE media_mergers (
  merger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  merger_date DATE,
  media_company VARCHAR(255),
  competitor_company VARCHAR(255),
  merger_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE market_competition (
  competition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  media_company VARCHAR(255),
  market_share DECIMAL(10,2),
  market_concentration DECIMAL(10,2),
  merger_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (merger_id) REFERENCES media_mergers(merger_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Market_Share (
    id INT,
    company_name VARCHAR,
    market_share FLOAT,
    revenue FLOAT,
    market_entry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Competition_Indices (
    id INT,
    company_name VARCHAR,
    market_concentration FLOAT,
    herfindahl_index FLOAT,
    competition_ranking INT
);

CREATE TABLE merger_details (
    merger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    acquiring_company_id INT NOT NULL,
    target_company_id INT NOT NULL,
    merger_date DATE,
    merger_value DECIMAL(15, 2)
);
